main event: A witness reported sighting a red object in the sky during daylight on 14 February 1969.
interesting points: The object was sighted for about 10 minutes before it faded out of view., The observation occurred in Vandalia, Ohio., The witness described the object as red and potentially a balloon or aircraft., There were no confirmed photographs or physical evidence associated with the sighting., The witness indicated this was their first sighting of a similar phenomenon.
